Hydras:

"Tell me about the internal and externals defenses"hissed Hydras

-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Wednesday, June 29, 2011 6:50 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Hydras and Predacons

> <OLD>
>
> The predacon leader inspected the area and smiled pleased, the repairs are
> almsot done and soon it will be a fuctional base. Now his main goal is 
> have
> their defences ready and working asap.
>
> Hydras hissed and said to Cyclonus"No, we have to focus in stand in our
> position and make our faction stronger" Hydras started to inspect his 
> troops
> and asked to Cyclonus "Any idea how to camuflage this base and made us...
> invibisible to enemie's detection? or do you suggest to have a better 
> place
> where set a Fortress?"

<NEW>

CYCLONUS turned to DEEPSRYKE first and gestured to him to dismiss the
troops. With the inspection over there was no need for them to be here
to listen to all thier plans.

"Group dismissed!" DEEPSTRYKE said in a firm military voice. and with
that the other Predacons broke ranks and began to move away from the
area, most having other missions to perform.

Turning back to HYDRAS there was a thoughtful look on CYCLONUS's face.
"This base can be as good as any other. But you have not told me what
you plan to do. I can better advise you if I know what you needed. I
am not sure what you need."

(TAG)

Preston
